title: STAT+: FTC settles lawsuit with Express Scripts over charges it manipulated insulin prices, impeded access
description: The FTC settled a lawsuit against Express Scripts over allegations that the company artificially inflated the price of insulin and impeded access to treatment.
content: The FTC settled a lawsuit against Express Scripts over allegations that the company artificially inflated the price of insulin and impeded access to treatment.
